mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_basic_estate (id, apply_id, province, city, district, block_id, developer_id, name, street, number, land_level, attach_number, floor_area, cover_an_area, volumetric_rate, greening_rate, building_number, position, description, average_price, price_range, version, creator, gmt_created, gmt_modified) values ( #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blockId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{developerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{landLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attachNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{floorArea,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{coverAnArea,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{volumetricRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{greeningRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buildingNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{averagePrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priceRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
